column4: when P2P clients like Limewire talk about the Gnutella network, does that mean that other P2P clients use the network besides Limewire? Like I could be downloading stuff from people who use something else? or if I'm using Limewire I'm only downloading from other people who have Limewire ?
What other networks are there besides Gnutella - just curious ?
Ahhh I didn't realize emule/edonkey were a network, i assumed they all used Gnutella
